name: Anime Haven - Dynamic Darkness v1.6
description: Based off my Cyan Darkness style, allows anyone to select their own preferred color's. *The only downside is the logo is rather simplistic to keep things appealing whatever your color of choice may be.
additional_info: - Updated alongside Simply Dark v1.6 - Created based on Cyan Darkness v1.5 Like the style: Tip Me/Donate (͠≖ ͜ʖ͠≖)?
